description: This lightweight layer combines the sporty silhouette of a hooded windbreaker with soft cotton poplin.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 31" front body length, a 31.5" back body length, a 25.25" shoulder, a 60" chest, and a 38" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.

Size Tall 2L has a 33" front body length, a 33.5" back body length, a 23" shoulder, a 61" chest, and a 41" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Drawstring hood with leather stoppers. Full-zip front with a leather zipper pull.
Signature embroidered Pony at the left chest.
